dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset consists of handwritten digits and is commonly used for training various image processing systems. In this paper, it is used for sequence classification tasks where each 28x28 image is reshaped into a 784x1 sequence.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Nicolas Boulanger-Lewandowski
Yoshua Bengio
Pascal Vincent
dcterms:description: The Nottingham dataset contains British and American folk tunes and is used for evaluating models on polyphonic music modeling tasks.
dcterms:title: Nottingham

dcterms:creator: Mitchell Marcus
Beatrice Santorini
Mary Ann Marcinkiewicz
dcterms:description: The Penn Treebank (PTB) dataset contains a large annotated corpus of English, widely used for language modeling tasks.
dcterms:title: Penn Treebank (PTB)
